metadata.description: In the deep South, an ancient voodoo curse unleashes the "War on Flesh" - a hellish plague of voracious "Ew Chott": hornets that raise an army of the walking dead. This undead army spreads the plague by ripping the heart out of living creature to make room for a "Black Heart Hive" of more Ew Chott hornets. Souls collected bestow energy to the one who set free the curse, giving them limitless power. An unlikely group of five, salty individuals have to put their differences aside and combine their powers to destroy the onslaught of evil before it's too late.
metadata.name: War On Flesh
